https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/di4CaPq5KgbCburDF1WhMXUF84x.jpg This film from acclaimed theater director Lonny Price charts the journey of the original cast of Stephen Sondheim's "Merrily We Roll Along" in the 30-plus years since the musical debuted on Broadway at the Alvin Theatre in 1981. Best Worst Thing That Ever Could Have Happened...
